title: hw1
text:
##데이터분석_HW #84P

import pandas as pd

df= pd.DataFrame({
    "col1":[1,2,3,]
})
df

pd.DataFrame()
df= pd.DataFrame({
    '제품' : ["사과", "딸기","수박"],
    '가격' : [1800,1500,3000],
    '판매량' : [24,38,13]
    })
df
sum(df['가격'] / 3)

2100.0

text:
02. 변수 수정

mid = pd.read_csv("data/midwest.csv")
mid
mid_new = mid.copy()
mid_new
mid_new = mid_new.rename(columns = {"poptotal":"total"})
mid_new = mid_new.rename(columns = {"popasian":"asian"})
mpg_new

title: hw1
text:
03. 파생변수 만들기

import matplotlib.pyplot as plot
mid_new["ratio"] = mid_new["asian"]/mid_new["total"] *100
mid_new
mid_new["ratio"].plot.hist()
plot.show()

title: hw1
text:
04. 합격 판정 변수

import numpy as np
x=mid_new["ratio"].mean()
mid_new["group"]= np.where(mid_new["ratio"]>x,"large","small")
mid_new["group"]

0      small
1      small
2      small
3      small
4      small
       ...  
432    large
433    small
434    small
435    large
436    large
Name: group, Length: 437, dtype: object
